entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 March 2023
